title: Pipeline X Template Metadata Schema
name: Pipeline X Template Metadata Schema
description: Canonical schema for JSON templates stored under .pipeline-x/templates/.

description.description: Short explanation of what this template is for.

version.description: Template version, free-form but SHOULD be semver-compatible.

category.description: Logical category for this template (e.g., ingestion, meta-plan, planning, processing, output, verify, workflows, machine-state).

placeholders.description: Key-value placeholders to customize the template for a specific job.

steps.description: Ordered list of high-level steps this template encodes.

acceptance.description: Acceptance criteria that MUST hold when the template is successfully applied.
